title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 277: Featuring Rob Schremp
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Rob Schremp. Rob joins (27:20) to talk about his time playing for the London Knights, his NHL career, and how he is helping young hockey players. The guys also talked NHL draft lottery, Chiclets Cup, new CBA and more. The boys wrap up with Ryan talking about the worst 30 minutes of his year and a good TV show recommendation from RA and Grinnelli.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
